languages.text: "Мои руки больше не вершат убийств, но кровь испятнала мои пальцы навечно. Я возомнила о себе слишком много, но стыд пробил панцирь высокомерия. Не желаю тебе узнать это чувство — осознание, что твои идеалы и деяния были лишь следствием чужой манипуляции".

"My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."
languages.original_text: "Мои руки больше не вершат убийств, но кровь испятнала мои пальцы навечно. Я возомнила о себе слишком много, но стыд пробил панцирь высокомерия. Не желаю тебе узнать это чувство — осознание, что твои идеалы и деяния были лишь следствием чужой манипуляции".

traits.locale_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too great an opinion of myself, until shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Meine Händen wollen nicht mehr morden, aber an meinen Fingern wird für alle Zeit But kleben. Auch ich hatte eine hohe Meinung von mir, aber die Scham hat den Panzer meiner Hybris gesprengt. Ich wünsche Euch dieses Gefühl nicht ... zu erkennen, dass Eure Ideale und Taten der Manipulation eines anderen entsprangen."
languages.original_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Händen wollen nicht mehr morden, aber an meinen Fingern wird für alle Zeit But kleben. Auch ich hatte eine hohe Meinung von mir, aber die Scham hat den Panzer meiner Hybris gesprengt. Ich wünsche Euch dieses Gefühl nicht ... zu erkennen, dass Eure Ideale und Taten der Manipulation eines anderen entsprangen."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Si mes mains ont cessé de semer la mort, mes doigts sont irrémédiablement tachés de sang. J'avais une trop haute opinion de moi-même, mais la honte a fêlé la carapace de mon orgueil. Je ne vous souhaite pas de ressentir ça un jour... de réaliser que tous vos idéaux et vos agissements étaient manipulés par un autre. »
languages.original_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."

traits.locale_text: « Si mes mains ont cessé de semer la mort, mes doigts sont irrémédiablement tachés de sang. J'avais une trop haute opinion de moi-même, mais la honte a fêlé la carapace de mon orgueil. Je ne vous souhaite pas de ressentir ça un jour... de réaliser que tous vos idéaux et vos agissements étaient manipulés par un autre. »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「私の手はもはや殺人を犯すことはない。だが、その指は永遠に血で汚れたままだ。私は己を高く評価しすぎていたが、恥が傲慢の殻を突き破ったのだ。私はこのことを…己の理想や行いが、他人の手によって形作られたものだと気づくような感覚が…あなたに訪れないことを願う」
languages.original_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."

traits.locale_text: 「私の手はもはや殺人を犯すことはない。だが、その指は永遠に血で汚れたままだ。私は己を高く評価しすぎていたが、恥が傲慢の殻を突き破ったのだ。私はこのことを…己の理想や行いが、他人の手によって形作られたものだと気づくような感覚が…あなたに訪れないことを願う」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «Mis manos ya no siembran la muerte, pero mis dedos estarán siempre manchados de sangre. Tenía un concepto demasiado elevado de mí misma, pero la vergüenza perforó el caparazón de mi soberbia. No le deseo la sensación de comprender que sus ideales y sus actos estaban guiados por la manipulación de otra persona».
languages.original_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."

traits.locale_text: «Mis manos ya no siembran la muerte, pero mis dedos estarán siempre manchados de sangre. Tenía un concepto demasiado elevado de mí misma, pero la vergüenza perforó el caparazón de mi soberbia. No le deseo la sensación de comprender que sus ideales y sus actos estaban guiados por la manipulación de otra persona».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “我的双手已经不再杀戮，但我指间的鲜血已经再也洗不干净了。我曾自视甚高，可最终，耻辱刺穿了我傲慢的躯壳。我意识到，我的理想与行为实际上都是被别人操纵的，我希望你永远不会体会到这样的感觉。”
languages.original_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."

traits.locale_text: “我的双手已经不再杀戮，但我指间的鲜血已经再也洗不干净了。我曾自视甚高，可最终，耻辱刺穿了我傲慢的躯壳。我意识到，我的理想与行为实际上都是被别人操纵的，我希望你永远不会体会到这样的感觉。”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Ellerim artık cinayet işlemiyor ama parmaklarım sonsuza dek kanla kaplı kalacak. Kendimi fazla değerli görüyordum ancak aşırı gururum, utançla parçalandı. Aynı hissi senin de yaşamanı istemem. İdeallerinin ve eylemlerinin başka birinin manipülasyonuyla şekillendiğini fark etmeni..."
languages.original_text: "My hands no longer sow murder, but my fingers are forever stained with blood. I had too high an opinion of myself, but shame pierced the shell of my hubris. I do not wish this feeling upon you — to realise that your ideals and deeds were shaped by another's manipulation."
